## Section 1.3.2 Efficiency

```{r}
library(cmna)
f = c(30, -19, -15, 3, 1)
x = c(-1, 0, 1)
naivepoly(x, f)
```

```{r}
betterpoly(x, f)
```

```{r}
horner(x, f)
```
